ASML expects US, Dutch export rules to hit China sales by 10-15%Dutch computer chip equipment maker ASML on Wednesday said it expected new U.S. and Dutch export restrictions to reduce its potential sales to China by some 10-15% this year after they hit record levels in 2023. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 08:46:55 GMT UYF3B5JIWRJSFIAEZ2GBUS5RRA https://www.reuters.com/technology/asml-expects-us-dutch-export-rules-hit-china-sales-by-10-15-2024-01-24/Reuters技术
VIEW China central bank acts to support markets, economyChina's central bank will cut the amount of cash that banks must hold as reserves from Feb. 5, governor Pan Gongsheng said on Wednesday, the first such cut for the year as policymakers extend efforts to shore up a fragile economic recovery. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 08:45:30 GMT KMODW6PTMRLK7EN2SOFXFDSSJM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/view-china-central-bank-acts-support-markets-economy-2024-01-24/Reuters世界中国
FTSE 100 gains as China pledges aid sentiment, EasyJet climbsThe UK's blue-chip index rose on Wednesday, lifted by China-exposed stocks following measures by the central bank to support the economy, while shares in Easyjet jumped after the airline forecast a smaller loss. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 08:42:28 GMT 2W2P73LEOBPXVGW4UT2UQRWT5A https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/ftse-100-gains-china-pledges-aid-sentiment-easyjet-climbs-2024-01-24/Reuters世界英国
China will cut banks' reserve ratio from next month to bolster economic recoveryChina's central bank will cut the amount of cash that banks must hold as reserves from Feb. 5, governor Pan Gongsheng said on Wednesday, the first such cut for the year as policymakers extend efforts to shore up a fragile economic recovery. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 08:11:57 GMT NYOPESK2VNNILAX3XWLVAL2MAA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-will-cut-banks-reserve-ratio-next-month-bolster-economic-recovery-2024-01-24/Reuters世界中国
Nokia and China's Oppo resolve disputes through cross-license dealFinnish telecom gear maker Nokia said on Wednesday it had signed a 5G patent cross-licensing deal with Chinese device maker Oppo that resolves patent litigation between the companies. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 07:23:47 GMT PV2PZKUA4FJP7IM6A7DU2ELSLQ https://www.reuters.com/business/media-telecom/nokia-chinas-oppo-resolve-disputes-through-cross-license-deal-2024-01-24/Reuters商业媒体与电信
Growth in low-emissions power expected to cover demand - IEAPower generated from low-emissions sources, such as wind, solar and nuclear, will be adequate to meet growth in global demand for the next three years, the International Energy Agency (IEA) said, adding power sector emissions are on the decline. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 07:06:15 GMT 7VIQWHWZ3ZLEFHBWC6JSLIEXII https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/growth-low-emissions-power-expected-cover-demand-iea-2024-01-24/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
ASML orders surge to record in Q4, but keeps 2024 outlook unchangedChipmaking equipment maker ASML Holding on Wednesday reported fourth-quarter earnings that beat expectations and its best-ever quarterly orders, but it kept a cautious outlook for 2024 as it faces new restrictions on exports to China. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 06:34:43 GMT LPATJEL25RKL5IMG75XSIODXPA https://www.reuters.com/technology/asml-fourth-quarter-earnings-beat-expectations-keeps-outlook-unchanged-2024-01-24/Toby Sterling技术
Facing tough China EV competition, Nidec cuts profit forecast 18%Japanese electric motor maker Nidec Corp slashed its full-year operating profit forecast by nearly a fifth on Wednesday, warning of uncertainty in demand and intensifying price competition in China's electric vehicle market. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 06:28:16 GMT 2PP534FDGFPGLB5B2BDOWCLE5E https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/japans-nidec-nearly-doubles-operating-profit-third-quarter-2024-01-24/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Taiwan president-elect signals desire to join US-led trade frameworkTaiwan's president-elect, Lai Ching-te, signalled on Wednesday his desire for Taipei to join the U.S.-led Indo-Pacific Economic Framework, considering the island's key role in the global economy. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 06:20:14 GMT MTMTFGQWRNNNGNBEMSKW4A4OPOQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-president-elect-signals-desire-join-us-led-trade-framework-2024-01-24/Reuters世界亚太地区
China short sellers retreat as contrarians sense an opportunityGlobal investors aren't expecting much from China's economy this year, but some say the collapse in its already cheap stocks merits a wager on an eventual rebound and perhaps a new approach to investing in the market. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 05:46:49 GMT TJNOPZE3AFI75DP5PMR6LPW2MI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-short-sellers-retreat-contrarians-sense-an-opportunity-2024-01-24/Summer Zhen世界中国
Morning Bid: No luck for China stocks, or for BarbieA look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee Wed, 24 Jan 2024 05:36:42 GMT 2WTGUCTU6JJYZMKSWMVK5TYXYA https://www.reuters.com/markets/europe/global-markets-view-europe-2024-01-24/Reuters市场欧洲市场
